labels: I do not agree at all

q_text.text: I take pleasure in mutually bonding with other players.
Feeling a deep and personal connection to other players is important to me.
I like to share thoughts and emotions with players who are important to me.
I enjoy cultivating meaningful relationships in games.
I enjoy the company of other players in a game..
I e like reasonless chatting with other players.
I have more fun if I can play with friends.
Enjoying positive social interactions is an important part of gaming for me.
Being a part of a group with many other players makes me feel secure.
In games, I wish to be part of a group.
I feel relieed when other players interact with me.
I am glad if I find stronger players, who want to spend time with me.
In games I hope that other players include me into their group.
In games, I am worried that other players won't like me.
I have a strong wsh not to be rejected by other players.
I don't want to end up alone in games.
Playing on my own makes me feel lonely.
I am worried that my gaming friends will turn their back on me.
Challenging tasks in games are fun.
I am eager to engage with content that captivates me.
I seek out gaming activities in which I can be fully absorbed.
I strive to perform fluently when I play games.
I set high standards for myself when it comes to improving my abilities.
I am constantly trying to improve my skill in games.
If a game task is difficult, I need to master it.
I always try to perform my very best in games.
I always aim to find elegant solutions for problems in games.
I always try to perform better than others in games.
I like to be more skilled than other players.
I enjoy when score boards display how well I contributed to my team's success.
I fell proud when I achieve in-game goals that few can complete.
I feel relieved when I succeed in a game.
If game content is difficult, I am worried that I might not succeed
I'd rather set the difficulty level in games lower than risk failure.
I feel a strong need to avoid making mistakes in games.
I am anxious aobut being perceived as unskilled in games.
I feel helpless when I perform badly in games.
I enjoy assisting other player when they need help.
I am eager to provide emotional support for other players.
I help other players through the difficulties they face.
I find it rewarding to mentor other players who need guidance.
I feel competent when I give other players advice or directions.
I like to be a good influence on other players.
I encourage other players in order to motivate them.
I try to imporve an outcome by taking the lead when playing games.
I find it rewarding to take control of a team in games.
I like it when players turn to me over others when they have questions.
I want other players to recognize my high status.
I like to collect the most prestigious items to show off in games.
I try to influence other players, so they will support me maintaining my status.
I enjoy dominating others in a game.
I am willing to use aggressive tactics in a game to get my way.
When other players challenge me, I want to put them in their place.
I want other players to acknowledge my superiority.
I dislike being surrounded by stronger players.
I always try to perform my very best in games.
I always aim to find elegant solutions for problems in games.
I always try to perform better than others in games.
